front.title: A guide to United States flat-rolled steel compliance requirements

author.organization: National Institute of Standards and Technology (U.S.).

front.abstract: This guide addresses flat-rolled (hot or cold) steel, including stainless, alloy, non-alloy or iron. It does not include finished products.

seriesInfo.name: NISTIR; NIST IR; NIST interagency report; NIST internal report
